metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: Devegion builds custom web and mobile solutions from concept to launch. We are experts in web development, mobile apps, UI/UX design, and software consulting.

hero.description: Complete web and mobile solutions, from initial strategy to final delivery. We blend cutting-edge development, thoughtful design, and expert consulting to bring digital products to life. Built on a foundation of knowledge-sharing, we've trained hundreds of developers who power innovation.

services.title: What we do...
services.description: Web, mobile, UI/UX, and consulting services tailored for modern businesses. We deliver high-quality web platforms, mobile apps, outstanding user experience design, and strategic guidance to help your company grow. Our expertise covers the entire digital journey—from concept to launch.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.strongPoint5: Custom websites built for your needs
webDevelopment.strongPoint6: Scalable solutions that grow with you

projects.title: Some of our work...
projects.description: Explore the web and mobile solutions we've crafted for clients across industries. Each project reflects our dedication to excellence and innovation.

carCareRo.title: CarCareRo
carCareRo.description: A mobile app that helps drivers manage their car insurance policies and maintenance schedules. Track service history, set reminders, and keep all vehicle documents in one place.

restaurantTm.title: RestaurantTM
restaurantTm.description: A multi-tenant mobile platform for Timisoara's dining scene. Discover restaurants, read authentic reviews, explore locations, and find your next favorite meal in the city.

paulPhoto.title: PaulPhoto
paulPhoto.description: A custom-made web portfolio platform for a photographer. Showcase stunning photography collections with flexible layouts, easy content management, and a professional presentation that lets the work speak for itself.

mcDermot.title: MCDermot
mcDermot.description: A custom-built web platform for a UK landscaping company. Highlight beautiful outdoor transformations with a modern, fully bespoke design powered by a headless CMS.

people.title: Meet the developers
people.description: Meet our team of young innovators. We bring fresh ideas, passion for technology, and a drive to build solutions that make a difference. Together, we turn challenges into opportunities.

reviews.description: Hear what our clients have to say. Real projects, real results, real feedback from businesses we've helped grow.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Got questions? Find quick answers to the most common questions about our services, process, pricing, and timelines.

q1.title: How long does it take to build a web or mobile app?
q1.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and requirements. A simple website takes 4-6 weeks, while a custom web or mobile application typically requires 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines after understanding your specific needs.

q2.title: What services do you offer?
q2.answer: We provide complete web development, mobile app development (iOS and Android), UI/UX design, and strategic consulting. From concept to launch, we handle every aspect of your digital product, including ongoing support and maintenance.

q3.title: How much does a custom software project cost?
q3.answer: Costs depend on project scope, features, and complexity. We offer transparent pricing and provide detailed quotes after discussing your requirements. Contact us for a free consultation and personalized estimate for your project.

q4.title: Do you provide support after launch?
q4.answer: Yes! We offer ongoing maintenance, updates, bug fixes, and technical support after your project goes live. We're committed to ensuring your digital product continues to perform optimally and grows with your business needs.

q5.title: What technologies do you work with?
q5.answer: We use modern, proven technologies including React, Node.js, React Native, and cloud platforms like AWS. Our tech stack is chosen based on your project's specific requirements to ensure scalability, security, and optimal performance.

q6.title: Who owns the code and intellectual property?
q6.answer: You own everything. Once the project is completed, all source code, designs, documentation, and intellectual property rights are transferred to you. We believe in full transparency and client ownership.

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Discover Devegion's story: Founded in 2020 by Damian, we grew from workshops and tech projects to web, mobile, UI/UX design, and consulting for entrepreneurs and businesses. Join us in building innovative solutions.

story.introduction: Living on the edge where academia meets industry, our story dates back to 2020 when our founder, Damian, created a place of growth for those talents that wanted to achieve more. Conducting workshops, tech talks and social networking events, he kept an eye on vocal individuals with high standards focused on knowledge intake and skill development. Projects were made, applications created, foundations built. Now, we're opening our gates to a wide audience of entrepreneurs that wish to consolidate their tech part of the business - to you.

phase1.title: The Beginning
phase1.description: Our story started in 2020, when our founder, Damian — a senior professional in the tech industry — envisioned a place where ambitious talents could grow beyond the limits of academia. Through the Google Developer Students Club, he organized workshops, tech talks, and networking events, building a community where curiosity, collaboration, and high standards thrived. This foundation set the stage for continuous growth and lasting impact.

phase2.title: In-House Innovation
phase2.description: By 2022, our team had grown stronger, and the quality of our work reached new heights. With the expertise gained from diverse projects, we began developing our own in-house products, turning bold ideas into practical solutions. This step marked a new era of creativity, ownership, and innovation within our company.

phase3.title: Making a Difference
phase3.description: In 2025, we set our sights on creating meaningful impact. Beyond delivering excellent web and mobile solutions, we focused on driving change within our industry and community. Our vision expanded to not only build products but to empower people, fostering an environment where technology and human potential grow hand in hand.

metadata.title: Contact Us
metadata.description: Contact Devegion today for custom web and mobile solutions, UI/UX design, and software consulting. Discuss your project with our team via form or phone, here for your vision.

ContactUsPage.title: Contact Us
ContactUsPage.description: Whether you want to work with our team, have questions, feedback, or need assistance, our teams is here to help.

metadata.title: Web Development
metadata.description: Devegion delivers high‑performance web development, custom websites, and scalable web apps optimized for growth, conversion, and modern user experience.

hero.title: Web Apps That Sell
hero.description: From idea to launch, we craft fast, scalable, and user‑focused web apps designed to drive real business growth.

howItWorks.title: How We'll Build Your Website
howItWorks.description: Our process combines clear communication, agile development, and powerful design to ensure your product succeeds from day one.

stage1.title: Discuss Your Vision
stage1.description: We listen to your project idea, understand your goals, and identify the key features that will make your product successful.

stage2.title: Plan & Estimate
stage2.description: Choose the best tools and technologies for your project. Get a clear MVP timeline with transparent pricing and milestones.

stage3.title: Build & Iterate
stage3.description: Stay in the loop with regular progress updates. We adapt and pivot based on your feedback to ensure perfect alignment.

stage4.title: Support & Scale
stage4.description: Launch with confidence knowing we're here for maintenance, bug fixes, and adding new features as your product grows.

metadata.title: Mobile Development
metadata.description: Devegion builds high‑quality mobile apps for iOS and Android using modern frameworks and scalable architectures. We transform your ideas into seamless, engaging mobile experiences that drive growth and delight users.

hero.title: Production Ready Mobile Apps
hero.description: From concept to deployment, Devegion delivers fast, secure, and beautifully designed mobile apps that perform flawlessly across devices.

howItWorks.title: How We'll Build Your Mobile App
howItWorks.description: Our mobile development process combines strategy, design, and agile execution to create feature‑rich apps that scale with your business.

stage1.title: Define Your Product Vision
stage1.description: We dive deep into your concept, understand your target audience, and outline a clear strategy that connects your business goals with user needs.

stage2.title: Design & Prototype
stage2.description: Our design team crafts intuitive, visually appealing interfaces and clickable prototypes so you can preview the experience early on.

stage3.title: Develop, Test & Launch
stage3.description: We bring your app to life using robust technologies, ensure flawless performance through rigorous QA testing, and guide you through App Store and Google Play releases.

metadata.title: UI/UX Design
metadata.description: Devegion creates stunning UI/UX designs that combine beauty, simplicity, and performance. We craft intuitive interfaces and user journeys that boost engagement and convert visitors into customers.

hero.title: Pixel-Perfect Design
hero.description: At Devegion, we design visually captivating, user‑focused experiences that make your product stand out in a crowded digital landscape.

howItWorks.title: The Design Process
howItWorks.description: Our design process balances creativity with user strategy to shape a product that feels effortless, looks exceptional, and meets real user needs.

stage1.title: Research & Discovery
stage1.description: We start by understanding your users, analyzing competitors, and identifying your product’s unique value to build a strong foundation for design.

stage2.title: Wireframes & Prototyping
stage2.description: We translate ideas into structure using wireframes and interactive prototypes, ensuring clarity and usability before the visuals take shape.

stage3.title: Visual Design & Handoff
stage3.description: Our designers polish every pixel to create a cohesive and scalable design system. We deliver ready‑to‑implement assets for your development team.

metadata.title: Software Consulting
metadata.description: Devegion provides expert software consulting to help businesses validate ideas, optimize architecture, and ensure product scalability. We guide you from concept to execution with data-backed strategies and technical excellence.

hero.title: Value Focused Software Consulting
hero.description: Partner with Devegion to turn your business challenges into actionable tech solutions. We align strategy, design, and technology to maximize impact and minimize risk.

howItWorks.title: How We Do Software Consulting
howItWorks.description: Our consulting process blends deep technical expertise with strategic insight, helping you make smarter decisions and build software that drives measurable results.

stage1.title: Assess & Strategize
stage1.description: We evaluate your current systems, clarify business goals, and define a roadmap to improve performance, scalability, and overall efficiency.

stage2.title: Design & Recommend Solutions
stage2.description: Based on your objectives, we propose architectures, frameworks, and technologies tailored to your requirements and team capabilities.

stage3.title: Implement & Optimize
stage3.description: We help you put insights into action—overseeing implementation, refining workflows, and setting up a foundation for continuous improvement.
